name: Block Force - 3D FPS Shooting
description:
Block Force - 3D FPS Shooting, is developed by JoyDo Entertainment Studio.

JoyDo Entertainment Studio: the developer of the famous games "Cops N Robbers (FPS)", "Cops N Robbers (Jail Break)" and "Survival Games".

"Block Force" is the new online pixel fps game developed by JoyDo Studio, released by Riovox Company. We are committed to develop the best online pixel shooting game on mobile device. This time, we bring a whole new experience for you. Keep fighting to be the best shooter.

*** Game Features ***
1. Online Competitive & Optimize network experience: 5 regions (GLOBAL, US, EU, ASIA, JP).
2. Multiplayer fighting in one room: Up to 20 players in the same room.
3. Pixel Graphics: Shock of visual effect with 3D pixel style.
4. Five modes: Death Match Mode, Killing Competition Mode, Stronghold Mode, Explosion Mode, Mutation (Zombie) Mode, Hunting Mode.
5. Friend System: add friends in game, fighting with buddies all around the world!
6. Skin Editor: create your own skins.
7. Armor System: Equip hat & cape & boot to your character.
8. Growth System: Keep fighting to promote your rank.
9. Reward System: rich game rewards, give you a sustained combat power.

*** Feedback & Support***
support@riovox.com
